attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By Molly Ivins and Lou Dubose, this book comprises the views of two investigative journalists of 'The short but happy political life of George W. Bush'(ISBN 0-375-75714-7)Although it will need up-dating, this book is an amazing indictment of the US President's antecedents prior to his election.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
